## LoggerConfig type

Configuration for the internal logger of the AWS Connect Chat session.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LoggerConfig = {
    level: LogLevel;
    customizedLogger?: Logger;
};
```
**References:** [LogLevel](./chat-core-aws-connect.loglevel.md)
